answer:
how do you think the ghc celebrates new years

i feel like andi makes little memory boxes at the end of each year to highlight some of their biggest moments with momentos and flyers from stuff they did together and they look at their resolutions from last year and write ones for the next year for andi to put in the next box

in your opinion what was the best thing you created this year

it’s actually something that i’m working on right now you’ll see soon

what character surprised you the most this year

best boy TJ

I did not like him at first I thought Tyrus was completely random and thought the hype would blow over I never once shipped j/yrus but I definitely was not rooting for TJ

But now he’s one of my favorites how about that

blog.name: kittysrllygreetart

blog.description: fatima, she/her, my interests change every 5 months

tags: ALSO SHOUT OUT TO THE CREEDIES
the discord hasnt been around for a long time
but i still feel i've known yall for 10 years
body:
SAPPY TIME 🤠

one of the biggest things to happen to me this year was being involved in this fandom. granted i technically joined it in november 2017, but i never truly got involved until this year.

ever since my posts started showing up in the andi mack tag, everyone has been nothing but kind to me. the support for my art (even when it was really bad) has been unreal and insanely positive, and everyone is just…great?

this fandom can seem hopeless at times and with how its been growing over the past few months due to tyrus’ popularity, it feels really big, but at the same time, it’s just like a family. which is annoyingly cliche but still. this fandom has truly been an amazing thing to be in.

i hope 2019 is even better (which is saying something) and i hope yall are still willing to put up with my annoying crackhead ass bc i wont be going anywhere for a while 😎

summary: I love the idea of TJ and Buffy bonding over vines. Just simultaneously shouting “this bitch empty! Yeet!” And yelling, “you nee...
body: I love the idea of TJ and Buffy bonding over vines. Just simultaneously shouting “this bitch empty! Yeet!” And yelling, “you nee some milk!!” At people. Quoting all sorts of vines all the time. I’m here for it.

tags: OH OH OH HEY GUESS WHAT
LESS THAN THREE WEEKS LEFT BEFORE THE MACK IS BACK
title: i gotta get sentimental
body:
i didn’t know one single show that hasn’t even come to completion yet could be so influential in my life. i started actually watching andi mack this year and the number of horrible nights it’s made better is immeasurable. 

i also joined the friendom back in august, which feels like so long ago because i’ve somehow come so far on this hellsite lmao. a lot of people take breaks from social media when things aren’t working out, but me? this is my only escape from the harsh reality of the self-doubt and stress and anxiety this year has caused me. i have you guys to thank for that.

as much as i absolutely despise saying it, 2019 could very well be the last year of andi mack. the last year of freaking the fuck out over the smallest scenes or moments in the latest episode, the last year of the friendom truly being the friendom.

i say all of this with the most hope i could possibly have for a fourth season, and the hope of this community we’ve built not tearing to shreds as soon as the andi mack is actually over, whenever that may be.

but i gotta prepare for the worst outcome, ya feel?

so, if it is the last year, i’d like to express my gratitude in advance. thank you for the fanfiction i spent so many nights crying, laughing, and feeling all the damn feels over. thank you for the all the art i never wanted to stop staring at because it’s so damn good. thank you for the memes i practically cried laughing at. the moodboards, the edits (images and videos), the shitposts, the crackships, any tiny content that made me smile. and of course, the man himself, @persongoingfast , for driving us insane with the hints and being so active with us. all of it. i’m so appreciative of being able to see it all in my feed everyday. 

and i can’t wait for more of it next year.

and hopefully more after.

i also want to thank you guys for welcoming me into this crazy fandom. never thought i’d reach 500 followers so quickly (thank you so much for that, by the way!) and it means a lot when you guys like, reblog, and comment on the posts i make. i see all of it and it makes me really happy. :)

to conclude this long-ass, sappy post:

i love you guys a lot. let’s make 2019 the best year yet.

blog.name: thinkingabouttyrus
blog.title: You're the only person I can talk to like this.
blog.description: A Cyrus Goodman and TJ Kippen appreciation blog

summary: Before this year ends, I just want to take this time to thank the Andi Mack fandom. So... thank you. Thank you for being so...
body:
Before this year ends, I just want to take this time to thank the Andi Mack fandom.

So… thank you.

Thank you for being so wonderful to me and for welcoming this blog!

Last year, I was simply lurking around the tags and not really contributing to the fandom. But, then, two things happened that broke me to the point where I completely lost myself. I fell into a depressive state. I was crying all the time. I felt like nothing could ever make me happy again. I was so terrified of what 2018 would bring me. 

But, then, during the summer, for some odd reason, I decided to create an Andi Mack blog dedicated to TJ and Cyrus. I didn’t mean for it to be anything too huge, just a place for me to share my thoughts and reblog stuff. 

Then, I started writing fanfics. I started editing videos. I made friends. 

And, slowly, I began to heal. I found myself smiling and laughing, genuinely, again. I found myself waking up every day, excited to see what new content you guys have put out, what hilarious new thing Joshua said, what the cast have posted, what new crack ships and theories you’ve all come up with, etc.

You, guys, have no idea how eternally grateful I am for your presence in my life. You don’t know it but I’m telling you now… You are all instrumental in my healing.

You have all made me so incredibly happy. I know, there were a few times when I almost fell off the edge again, but you were all supportive and understood when I needed time to myself. And, at each of those times, I looked forward to coming back and you welcomed me back.

You all gave me a new reason to keep on living and reminded me why I want to keep living. I may not talk to all of you personally because I’m super shy about making the first move, but the few reblogs, comments, and conversations we all share as a fandom have made me feel like I found a family.

This is getting really sappy so before I cry in real life, I just want to say thank you, Andi Mack fandom. Thank you for being with me and loving me (and my content). I will continue to do my best for you and to be a good friend, even through the internet. 

With all my love,

Cait 

(I don’t think I ever shared my name, have I? Well, since we’re all family, there it is!)

Last year, I was simply lurking around the tags and not really contributing to the fandom. But, then, two things happened that broke me to the point where I completely lost myself. I fell into a depressive state. I was crying all the time. I felt like nothing could ever make me happy again. I was so terrified of what 2018 would bring me. 

But, then, during the summer, for some odd reason, I decided to create an Andi Mack blog dedicated to TJ and Cyrus. I didn’t mean for it to be anything too huge, just a place for me to share my thoughts and reblog stuff. 

Then, I started writing fanfics. I started editing videos. I made friends. 

And, slowly, I began to heal. I found myself smiling and laughing, genuinely, again. I found myself waking up every day, excited to see what new content you guys have put out, what hilarious new thing Joshua said, what the cast have posted, what new crack ships and theories you’ve all come up with, etc.

You, guys, have no idea how eternally grateful I am for your presence in my life. You don’t know it but I’m telling you now… You are all instrumental in my healing.

You have all made me so incredibly happy. I know, there were a few times when I almost fell off the edge again, but you were all supportive and understood when I needed time to myself. And, at each of those times, I looked forward to coming back and you welcomed me back.

You all gave me a new reason to keep on living and reminded me why I want to keep living. I may not talk to all of you personally because I’m super shy about making the first move, but the few reblogs, comments, and conversations we all share as a fandom have made me feel like I found a family.

This is getting really sappy so before I cry in real life, I just want to say thank you, Andi Mack fandom. Thank you for being with me and loving me (and my content). I will continue to do my best for you and to be a good friend, even through the internet. 

With all my love,

Cait 

(I don’t think I ever shared my name, have I? Well, since we’re all family, there it is!)

blog.name: tyrusforeves
blog.title: Tyrus. Is. Endgame.
blog.description:
“Love bro, I’m all about that shizzzz”

Andi mack/Tyrus/Muffy/Jandi/(yes I ship them, shut up) Bexie

tags: tyrus is going to be awesome
summary:
Cyrus tells Andi that he likes Jonah:
In my opinion, episode 17, (A Walker To Remember) was when tj realized his feelings for...
body:
As 2018 draws to a close, I want to look back at the best moments in Andi Mack (in my opinion):


Obviously, the swing scene:

Cyrus tells Andi that he likes Jonah:

In my opinion, episode 17, (A Walker To Remember) was when tj realized his feelings for Cyrus:

When Buffy and Cyrus resolve their conflict and help Jonah with his anxiety and panick attacks:

I know everybody hates them, but i love Jandi and when they kissed I was a heaping mess for like three days❤️❤️😭:

I loved Wandi as well, and I was very upset to see him and Buffy start dating😭:

This was one of the most devestating moments in Jyrus’ lives, but it was honestly a triumph for us Tyrus shippers:

Of course, the iconic look back that all the 9 year olds thought was for Buffy:

When Bex and Bowie got engaged😭❤️:

And last but not least, swing scene 2.0❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️😭😍😍😭❤️:

Some other great mentions:

  • When Buffy’s mom came back home.❤️
  • When andi called Bowie dad for the first time.❤️😭
  • When Miranda and Bowie broke up!👏🏽👏🏽
  • Anytime a character mentioned Marty.😂
  • Ham living off his dream of traveling the world❤️
  • Bed and ceila’s forming a bond after the rift they had.❤️
  • Andi and Amber forming a friendship.👏🏽❤️
  • When we all thought we were getting a jealous tj, but instead blondie was just a dumbass (still never really got over his name being Reed).
  • Cyrus’ dancing.😭😂😂😂😂😭
  • Buffy and jonah having some one on one time.😇 ( Lowkey I ship Juffy)

Can’t wait to see what 2019 brings!!!! I’m ready, but at the same time like, I’m not ready!!😂😂😂
